label: Caves Of Dragonmount 1
description:
Walking into Glint's cave, Chester notices the piles of gold coins strewn about.  Glint is nowhere to be found, and decides to search for the two other friends.

Hit 1 if you wish to call out to Ember in front of her cave.
Hit 2 if you wish to check out Shade's cave.

Hit 0 to quit.
